speaker: Patient
text: So, I was thinking, if I miss a dose of the escitalopram, should I take it as soon as I remember, or just wait until the next day?

speaker: Clinician
text: That's a good question. If you remember on the same day, it's usually okay to take it, but if it's the next day, just skip it and continue with your regular schedule. Missing one dose occasionally shouldn't cause too much trouble, but try to keep it consistent.

speaker: Patient
text: Yeah, I try to, but with the kids and everything, sometimes it just slips my mind. I don't want to mess up the progress I've made.

speaker: Clinician
text: I understand. Maybe setting a reminder on your phone could help? Or, uh, keeping the medication somewhere you'll see it every day, like next to your toothbrush?

speaker: Patient
text: That's a good idea. I think I'll try the phone reminder. It's just, you know, juggling everything can be a bit overwhelming.
